The USA is not a nation, and never was. The federal government does not have national authority over the sovereign people of any state. 
 We currently live under an illegal empire established by the Leviatian Juggernaut, and as a result, our lives are a shambles of dog-eat-dog factionalism between individuals fallen victim to maintream special interests, mercantilism and oligopoly-- all backed by sheer brute-force pragmatism, i.e. government of the gun, by the gun, and for the gun.
 
 However the law is still the law, and every state is STILL a sovereign nation.
 I challenge anyone to show otherwise.

 EVERY state?
 
 Including those established by the 'illegal empire'?

 Other wise, anyone can make up a law.
 My law would be that those named Joel Henderson should pay me $10 USD an hour, every hour of the day, every day of the week, every week of the year until he dies as an 'air tax'.
 As the lord of the sovereign nation of Earth, this law is in effect so long as such people are breathing or in any way using said 'air'.
 
 So, pay up.
